.csv: Comma-Separated Values File (used for data storage)
.xml: Extensible Markup Language File (used for data storage and exchange)
.json: JavaScript Object Notation File (used for data storage and exchange)
.html: Hypertext Markup Language File (used for web pages)
.htm: Hypertext Markup Language File (used for web pages)
.css: Cascading Style Sheet File (used for website styling)
.php: PHP Script File (used for web development)
.asp: Active Server Page File (used for web development)
.aspx: Active Server Page File (used for web development)
